game.name: The Abbess Garden
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cozy third-person gardening in 1643 France. As Agnès, restore a forbidden abbey garden, grow and identify real plants through the seasons, uncover a spy plot, help the community, and find romance.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cozy third-person gardening in 1643 France. As Agnès, restore a forbidden abbey garden, grow and identify real plants through the seasons, uncover a spy plot, help the community, and find romance.
